survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace Mental Health Resources Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction with the mental health resources provided by the workplace, identifying areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the mental health resources currently available at your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels effectively.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the mental health resources currently available at your workplace?

questions.question_text: Which of the following mental health resources have you utilized in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Subscription to mental health apps (e.g., Headspace, Calm)
questions.client_notes: Multiple selections allowed to capture usage patterns.

script.question_text: Which of the following mental health resources have you utilized in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Subscription to mental health apps (e.g., Headspace, Calm)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the accessibility of mental health resources provided by your workplace?

script.question_text: How would you rate the accessibility of mental health resources provided by your workplace?

questions.question_text: What additional mental health resources would you like to see offered by your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What additional mental health resources would you like to see offered by your workplace?

questions.question_text: How often do you feel comfortable discussing mental health concerns with your manager or HR?

script.question_text: How often do you feel comfortable discussing mental health concerns with your manager or HR?

questions.question_text: Has your workplace's mental health support positively impacted your overall well-being?
questions.routing_logic: Skip if Q1 answer is 'Very dissatisfied'.
questions.client_notes: Exclude respondents who are very dissatisfied to focus on actionable feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with skip logic based on Q1.

script.routing_logic: Skip if Q1 answer is 'Very dissatisfied'.
